service-1.title: Organizacija događaja
service-1.description: Specijalizovani smo za profesionalnu organizaciju korporativnih i muzičkih događaja, prilagođenih potrebama naših klijenata. Bilo da su u pitanju festivali, koncerti, kampanje, prezentacije, seminari ili bilo koji drugi tip događaja - kompletnu organizaciju prepustite nama.

service-2.title: Snimanje reklamnih spotova
service-2.description: Reklama je ključ za izgradnju prepoznatljivog brenda. Kroz nju ćete na pravi način predstaviti sebe i svoj proizvod ili uslugu ciljnoj publici. Kvalitetna reklama nije samo promocija - ona je već pola završenog posla. Tu smo da vam pomognemo da ostvarite svoje ciljeve i izgradite imidž koji bez sumnje zaslužujete.

service-3.title: Filmska produkcija
service-3.description: Postoji veliki broj prednosti i razloga zašto snimati filmove i serije u Srbiji. Počevši od lokacija i neverovatnih pejzaža koje Srbija nudi, pa sve do finansijskih olakšica za inostrane produkcije. Naš tim je tu da Vam olakša svaki korak, pružajući podršku u svim sektorima i rešavajući sva pitanja tokom procesa snimanja. Sa RealVibe-om dobijate kompletnu uslugu - od priprema i produkcije do završne post-produkcije. Uz našu iskusnu i kreativnu ekipu, vaš projekat je u sigurnim rukama.

service-4.title: Muzički spotovi
service-4.description: Vašu pesmu pretvorićemo u jedinstveno vizuelno iskustvo. RealVibe produkcija stvara muzičke spotove koji oživljavaju melodiju i prenose emociju publici na najautentičniji način. Naš kreativni i iskusni tim kreiraće vizuale koji savršeno odražavaju duh i energiju vaše pesme, donoseći pravi vajb koji ćete podeliti sa svetom.

about.title: Sva rešenja pod jednim krovom
about.description: RealVibe je vaše sveobuhvatno rešenje za organizaciju događaja i video produkciju. Naš širok spektar usluga garantuje uspeh vaših projekata, uz jednu posvećenu ekipu koja se prilagođava vašim specifičnim potrebama. Od početne ideje do završne realizacije, naš tim pažljivo upravlja svakim korakom procesa. Doživite udobnost i vrhunsku profesionalnost - sve što vam je potrebno nalazi se pod jednim krovom sa RealVibe-om.

mission.description: Kreativnošću i saradnjom želimo da stvorimo pozitivan uticaj na publiku i da stvorimo jedinstvenost u svetu umetnosti obezbeđujući da svaki projekat privuče pažnju i ostane upamćen stvarajući jedan bolji i povezaniji svet.

vision.description: Težimo da postanemo sinonim za izvrsnost u svakom projektu. Posvećeni vrhunskoj usluzi i inovativnim rešenjima, gradimo put ka povezanijem svetu - projekt po projekt, pomerajući granice mogućeg.

team.description: Naš tim čine iskusni kreativci s bogatim iskustvom, uvek u potrazi za inovativnim idejama i vrhunskim kvalitetom. Strastveno radimo na projektima, stvarajući pozitivnu energiju i inspirišući ljude oko sebe.

partners.description: Naši partneri su pažljivo odabrani kako bismo izgradili mrežu saradnika koja omogućava RealVibe-u da svojim klijentima pruži vrhunski i raznovrstan kvalitet svojim klijentima.

reason-1.description: Verujemo da je svaki projekat jedinstven, zbog čega pristupamo svakom sa posebnom pažnjom i posvećenošću, osiguravajući da bude realizovan na najbolji mogući način.

reason-2.description: Iskustvo, kreativnost i mladalački entuzijazam svih koji čine RealVibe-a osiguravaju inovativne kreacije i izvanredne rezultate svakog projekta, garantujući visok kvalitet.

reason-3.description: RealVibe Studio preuzima potpunu odgovornost za sve detalje od planiranja do izvršenja, osiguravajući efikasan proces oživljavajući vašu viziju.

reason-4.description: Naš pozitivan duh i način saradnje obezbeđuju izuzetno radno okruženje i neverovatne rezultate.

contact.title: Kontaktirajte nas! Sigurno imamo rešenje za vaše poslovne ideje.

description.one: Naša specijalnost i strast je organizacija velikih i malih korporativnih, muzičkih i sportskih događaja kao što su festivali, kampanje, koncerti, seminari, prezentacije i drugo.

offering-1.description: Od izrade koncepta i budžeta do izvršenja

offering-2.description: Bez obzira koji je tip događaja, naći ćemo savršenu lokaciju

offering-3.description: U zavisnosti od vaših potreba organizujemo odgovarajući ketering

offering-8.description: Izrada marketing strategije i promotivnog materijala

contact.title: Hajde da počnemo sa planiranjem vašeg sledećeg nezaboravnog događaja!

description.one: Pored zadivljujućih i raznovrsnih lokacija u Srbiji, naša zemlja nudi brojne prednosti za strane produkcije. Veliki izbor talentovanih profesionalaca ključ je za isporuku visokokvalitetnog finalnog proizvoda.
description.two: Takođe, snimanje u Srbiji može vam pomoći da značajno uštedite, dok istovremeno uživate u nezaboravnoj avanturi i produkciji visokog nivoa. U RealVibe-u smo posvećeni tome da vašu priču pretvorimo u pravo filmsko remek-delo.

offering-1.description: Detaljna priprema koja će olakšati proces snimanja

offering-2.description: Mesto za razmenu ideja i razradu inovativnih ideja

offering-4.description: Izrada strategija koje će upravljati celim filmskim procesom

offering-7.description: Dostupnost svih komponenti za visoku produkciju

offering-11.description: Obezbedićemo vam najbolju montažu, obradu zvuka i kolor korekciju

offering-12.description: Pomoći ćemo vam da obezbedite sve neophodne dozvole za snimanje

offering-13.description: Smanjenje stope PDV-a i osiguranje za vašu ekipu i opremu

contact.title: Pretvorimo vašu priču u remek delo. Započnite vaše filmsko putovanje sa nama već danas!

description.one: Realizacija kreativne ideje uvek je veliki, ali uzbudljiv izazov. Komunikacija s publikom najvažniji je korak za svaku kompaniju. Nama u RealVibe-u je ključno da razumemo vašu viziju i način na koji doživljavate svoj proizvod ili uslugu. Kreativnost je naša specijalnost, a tu smo da osmislimo reklamnu kampanju koja će biti privlačna, zanimljiva i jedinstvena - kampanju koja prenosi vašoj ciljnoj grupi jaku poruku.

offering-3.description: Detaljna priprema koja će olakšati proces snimanja

offering-5.description: Dostupnost svih komponenti za visoku produkciju

offering-7.description: Čuvamo energiju ekipe kako bi proizvod bio što bolji

offering-9.description: Obezbedićemo vam najbolju montažu, obradu zvuka i kolor korekciju

contact.title: Pretvorimo vašu ideju u moćnu, nezaboravnu reklamnu kampanju.

description.one: Da biste u potpunosti osvojili pažnju svoje publike, vaša pesma zaslužuje kvalitetan i atraktivan video koji upotpunjuje muzički doživljaj. U RealVibe-u verujemo u snagu muzičkog spota koji će da oživi vašu umetničku viziju i prenese emociju na višem nivou. Tu smo da vaše ideje pretvorimo u vizuelne priče koje ostavljaju trajan utisak.

offering-3.description: Detaljna priprema koja će olakšati proces snimanja

offering-5.description: Dostupnost svih komponenti za visoku produkciju

contact.title: Pretvorimo vašu pesmu u uspešan muzički spot.

text.one: A song that moves and captivates. “Every night I wander, always causing a scene, I only have one life, and I do everything my way…” - a song that leaves no one indifferent and invites you to dance until your last ounce of energy.
text.two: As in life, so in this video, everyone plays their role. The main Madam, surrounded by alluring women, leads a dynamic story that intertwines with the "strange world" surrounding Lukas. Each character brings unique energy, contributing to the one-of-a-kind atmosphere.
text.three: The set design is a true masterpiece - lavish pedestals, a rich feast filled with diverse food and drinks, glasses and bottles hinting at an endless celebration. The red curtain evokes a theater setting, while the stage hosts a performance to remember. With such energy and atmosphere, it's hard to wish the night to ever end! The video was filmed at Hype Studio.

challenge.title: Challenge:
challenge.text: YouTube has increasingly begun to restrict artistic freedom, and we certainly dislike creating anything that feels "cheap." How to make it seductive without being vulgar? Well, like this.

outcome.title: Outcome
outcome.text: The entire team had a fantastic time shooting the video, channeling their energy to the performers on camera, and most importantly—no one got lost! 🙂

team.title: Team involved in the production of the video:

extra.title: Extra
extra.person: Neda Savkić, Andreja Milutinović, Milica Janković, Selma Sadović, Vasilisa Perin, Ana Ilić, Aleksandra Jevtović

text.one: The song “Besprekorno los” is the first track from Aca Lukas's new album, with a music video produced by RealVibe Studio. This love ballad portrays the artist describing the girl as the brightest and purest point in his life while he lives in darkness, vice, and surrounded by the wrong people. The video is an emotional depiction of his story, in which he is searching for her all the time—she is his vision, his desire, unattainable and distant. Just when he thinks he has finally reached her, he realizes she isn't really there. “Leave me, just wave your wings.” The video was filmed at Avala Studio.

challenge.title: Challenge:
challenge.text: As this was the first collaboration between Aca Lukas and RealVibe, the challenge was to create a concept that the artist would like, establish an atmosphere during filming that would suit him, and ensure he felt comfortable throughout the process.

outcome.title: Outcome
outcome.text: Aca and his entire team were so satisfied with the result that they hired us for the entire album. The team thoroughly enjoyed working with Aca, and we were all eagerly looking forward to the next collaboration. 🙂

team.title: Team involved in the production of the video:

krik.title: Aca Lukas ft Mira Škorić - Krik

text.one: The return of Mira Škorić to the small screen, but in a grand style. A duet of two major Balkan stars mixed into a dynamic love ballad. They reminisce about their past, suffering for one another. The video tells the story set in an abandoned house filled with historical masterpieces—their souls still live there. The video begins with their old duet, a song over twenty years old. We see them telling their story again, but this time, it's a "Cry from the Soul." The video was filmed in a luxurious villa.

challenge.title: Challenge:
challenge.text: This was the first collaboration with Mira. The video had to tell a truly romantic story, make it artistic, introduce new details, and use world-renowned masterpieces in the best possible way.

outcome.title: Outcome
outcome.text: Both artists were pleased. The set design was utilized to its full potential, featuring paintings by some of the world's most famous painters and sculptures that enhanced the song's emotion, longing, and mood. The lighting and other elements complemented each other, creating the perfect atmosphere, merging the past and present. Editing and color grading elevated the final product to an even higher level.

team.title: Team involved in the production of the video:

text.one: An autobiographical song. This deeply emotional piece is accompanied by a touching video, perfectly designed to capture every feeling. A large part of the video consists of authentic footage from Aca's extensive archive of performances, while additional scenes were shot at Hype Studio, on a plane, and in front of a mirror.
text.two: In an intimate moment before the mirror, Aca dedicates the song to himself, preparing to step onto the stage. The airplane scenes tell a special story—moments from Aca's tour travels with his Folk House band. While everyone on the plane rests, Aca reflects: "I am the strongest when I have nothing—who am I when I have it all?"
text.three: The newest album by Aca Lukas is symbolically named after this beautiful song: “STRONGEST WHEN I HAVE NOTHING.”

challenge.title: Challenge:
challenge.text: The biggest challenge in realizing this project was conveying emotion through visuals and selecting the best moments from such an extensive archive to fit into 4 minutes and 30 seconds.

outcome.title: Outcome
outcome.text: Let us know your thoughts—we were all moved to tears and goosebumps at the same time. 🙂

team.title: Team involved in the production of the video:

text.one: Our "Duga (Rainbow)" took us straight to Spain. Magnificent flamenco dancers, along with other participants, added an irresistible visual charm to this emotional ballad.
text.two: Under the moonlight, Aca poses a question that resonates: “Is sorrow the ID card of love?” While sitting at the table, a captivating woman in a fiery red dress—the color of love—approaches, takes a rose, and disappears into the night. Earlier, we saw that roses don't seem to mean much to her. Yet, the question lingers—could this rose be different?
text.three: This touching story and the atmosphere of Spain make “Duga (Rainbow)” an unforgettable ballad that will stay in your heart.

challenge.title: Challenge:
challenge.text: Dancing for nearly five minutes without pause was a challenge; however, we believe that our dancers were guided by the melody and their love for their craft, delivering phenomenal performances alongside the rest of the team.

outcome.title: Outcome
outcome.text: We believe we succeeded in taking you on a brief journey to Spain, and we're confident that "Duga (Rainbow)" will become another favorite song on your playlist.

team.title: Team involved in the production of the video:

text.one: There are songs that carry a special story, and this one waited for its moment for nearly three decades, hidden in Aca's drawer, until the filming of the movie “Stravicno.” They say the most beautiful songs are those that the artist creates from the heart - and this is one of them.
text.two: The music video for the song combines emotions and storytelling, blending newly filmed scenes of Aca at the piano with unforgettable moments from the movie. The result is a visual and musical masterpiece that will remain etched in the audience's memory.

challenge.title: Challenge:
challenge.text: To justify everyone's trust in RealVibe's team to edit and create the music video using scenes from the movie.

outcome.title: Outcome
outcome.text: You watch the video and listen to the song in a single breath that lasts over five minutes.

team.title: Team involved in the production of the video:

text.one: Another touching love ballad that quickly found its place in taverns - as they are the spaces for laughter, tears, and unforgotten loves. The music video for this song was filmed in the authentic setting of an old sugar factory, inspired by the magical atmosphere of the movie "Charlie and the Chocolate Factory." The girl in the video, dressed in white, symbolizes his vision - an angel who haunts him as he moves through the darkness of life. “My world is as black as cocoa, and I'm waiting for my turn for hell, where miracles never happen” is a metaphor for the pain of unfulfilled loves.
text.two: This song and video win hearts with their emotions and the story that deeply touches every soul.

challenge.title: Challenge:
challenge.text: Enduring the cold on set because it was impossible to heat the space.

outcome.title: Outcome
outcome.text: Enjoy every tone of both the song and the imagery.

team.title: Team involved in the production of the video:

text.one: Another energetic song that promises unforgettable nights in the clubs! This time, our time machine transported us to the magical 1950s, bringing an authentic retro vibe infused with a modern rhythm.
text.two: The video is a true visual refreshment, thanks to the exceptionally beautiful and talented participants. The phenomenal Folk House band infused the shoot with their signature energy, while the young models captivated everyone with their charm and charisma. Their perfect synergy created an atmosphere that mesmerizes and leaves no one indifferent.
text.three: This is a song and video that will get you on your feet and take you back to a time when dancing and having fun were all that mattered!

challenge.title: Challenge:
challenge.text: Creating a less controversial video that complies with YouTube's monetization policies while still giving the video soul and extravagance.

outcome.title: Outcome
outcome.text: YouTube approved the video, and we achieved exactly the atmosphere we envisioned.

team.title: Team involved in the production of the video:

extra.title: Extra
extra.person: Milena Tunguz, Teodora Rakić, Maja Stolić, Viktorija Zeljković, Jovana Mitrekanić, Šćepan Knežević, Dženis Hatibović, Nikola Milovanović

text.one: “Lenka” is a cheerful and playful song from 2022 that has captured the hearts of fans of the lively tavern atmosphere with its lyrics and energetic rhythm. Lines like, “Oh Lenka, life knows you well. And even when I dream of you, the morning steals you away from me,” tell the story of the unattainable Lenka, who lives in the hearts of many men.
text.two: The music video, filmed at Hype Studio, radiates a phenomenal vibe thanks to the talented cast and the impeccable energy of the team. This was the final music video in the project with Aca, making it an emotional moment as every step of the collaboration was filled with laughter and creativity.
text.three: For those who want to feel a part of that energy, BTS videos are available from the shoot, showcasing the good vibes and joy brought by the RealVibe Studio team. “Lenka” is not just a song - it's a charming story about joy, laughter, and a love for music!

challenge.title: Challenge:
challenge.text: The only challenge on this project was resisting the temptation to have a drink amid the fantastic music and atmosphere.

outcome.title: Outcome
outcome.text: The tavern came to life, and Lenka has never been more beautiful or more unattainable!

team.title: Team involved in the production of the video:

tamburaPlayers.title: Tambura Players
tamburaPlayers.person: Miloš Repić, Marko Mastilović, Nikola Gradinac, Jovan Aleksić

text.one: We proudly present Mira Škorić in an entirely new light! After the successful duet with Aca Lukas in the song “Krik,” Mira brings a refreshing change to the local music scene with her new hit, “Branim se.” This song, accompanied by an impressive music video, tells a story of love, heartbreak, and resilience.
text.two: The video is rich in symbolism and visual spectacle - from the scene where Mira steps out of the car, surrounded by reporters bombarding her with questions, to the mysterious man trying to break through her impenetrable “shield.” The circle and shadows in the opening gradually reveal the main characters, while the shattered glass Mira peers into symbolizes her wounded soul and heart.
text.three: Despite the overwhelming emotions, Mira remains steadfast - determined to protect herself from the man who hurt her. But just as she believes she has closed the door to her past, he reappears…
text.four: “Branim se” is not just a song - it's a story of struggle, vulnerability, and inner strength, told in a way befitting a true star.

challenge.title: Challenge:
challenge.text: Clicking the camera flash quickly and frequently enough.

outcome.title: Outcome
outcome.text: An amazing video, with everyone thrilled and exceptionally satisfied.

team.title: Team involved in the production of the video:
